00027 #if defined(_REENTRANT)
00028 #include <typeinfo>
00029 #include "sys/SystemException.h"
00030 namespace sys
00031 {
00038 template <typename NativeConditionVar_T, typename Mutex_T>
00039 class ConditionVarInterface
00040 {
00041 public:
00042 
00052     ConditionVarInterface() : mMutex(NULL), mIsOwner(true)
00053     {}
00054 
00070     ConditionVarInterface(Mutex_T *theLock, bool isOwner = false) :
00071             mMutex(NULL)
00072     {
00073         mIsOwner = isOwner;
00074         mMutex = theLock;
00075     }
00076 
00078     virtual ~ConditionVarInterface()
00079     {
00080         if (mIsOwner && mMutex != NULL)
00081         {
00082             delete mMutex;
00083             mMutex = NULL;
00084         }
00085 
00086     }
00087 
00092     virtual bool acquireLock()
00093     {
00094         return mMutex->lock();
00095     }
00096 
00101     virtual bool dropLock()
00102     {
00103         return mMutex->unlock();
00104     }
00105 
00116     virtual bool wait(double timeout) = 0;
00117 
00122     virtual bool wait() = 0;
00123 
00128     virtual bool signal() = 0;
00129 
00134     virtual bool broadcast() = 0;
00135 
00142     NativeConditionVar_T& getNative()
00143     {
00144         return mNative;
00145     }
00146 
00151     const char* getNativeType() const
00152     {
00153         return typeid(mNative).name();
00154     }
00155 
00156 protected:
00157     NativeConditionVar_T mNative;
00158     Mutex_T *mMutex;
00159     bool mIsOwner;
00160 
00161 };
